text: Kirchdorf is a municipality of the Bern-Mittelland administrative district in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018, the former municipalities of Gelterfingen, MÃ¼hledorf and Noflen merged into the municipality of Kirchdorf. == References == == Other websites == * * Kirchgemeinde Kirchdorf http://www.kirchdorf.ch/ Category:Municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
